content: Bo LIANG is a research assistant in Dept. of Computer Science, HKBU. His research interests include 3D human reconstruction & animation, neural rendering and deep learning. He is now a member of HKBU Visual Computing Group and does research under the supervision of Dr. Jie CHEN, Assistant Professor in Dept. of Computer Science, HKBU.
